text: Cell biology involves the study of cells, their structure, function, and interactions with the environment.
Cell biology is a branch of biology focusing on the structure and function of the cell.
Photosynthesis is the process by which plants convert light energy into chemical energy.
Photosynthesis converts sunlight, carbon dioxide, and water into glucose and oxygen in plants.
The human heart pumps blood through the circulatory system, supplying oxygen and nutrients.
The heart is a muscular organ that maintains blood circulation by pumping blood throughout the body.
Quantum mechanics studies the behavior of particles at the atomic and subatomic level.
Quantum mechanics explains phenomena at microscopic scales, such as particles and waves.
Machine learning enables computers to learn from data and make decisions without explicit programming.
Machine learning is a subset of AI where models learn patterns from data to make predictions.
